meanings.definition: The quality or state of being thorny.
meanings.sent1: The thorninesses of the rose bush made it difficult to prune.
meanings.sent2: I felt the thorninesses of the cactus as I tried to move it.
meanings.sent3: The thorninesses of the hedgehog's spikes made it look like a tiny warrior.
meanings.sent4: The thorninesses of the situation were like navigating a field of sharp obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The thorninesses of the bramble bush left scratches on my arms.
